thread.section_title: OLDIES.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OLDIES.com | oldies.com | 4 of 417
thread.title: Will Notreturn

author: Will Notreturn
title: Will Notreturn
text: Order was not processed for a week from when I ordered the item. I had to call for them to realize it. Was told it would ship within a couple of days. Was informed that company is pretty large and not a 4x4 building so things may take a while. Told the next day shipping would be upgraded due to inconvenience of order not being processed and still was not shipped for 3 days passed that. It took my order over 2 weeks to be delivered from time of order and site says ships within 3 business days and I had expedited shipping. I understand things happen, but I was extremely disappointed. Don't false advertise if you can't ship with the time frame listed.
